name: @cosmic-plus/ledger-wallet
description: A wrapper around official Ledger libraries that makes it easier to deal with Ledger wallets in Stellar apps
author: MisterTicot <mister.ticot@cosmic.plus>

scripts.lint: npm run prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.build-misc: cp AUTHORS LICENSE README.md CHANGELOG.md package-lock.json web
scripts.build: for i in js misc; do npm run build-$i || return; done
scripts.rebuild: npm run get && cp -f web/package-lock.json . && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.check: npm run rebuild && cd web && git status
scripts.watch: npm run build-es5; webpack -d --watch & npm run watch-es5
